about_text_1: The Art of Living Indapur Meditation Center is dedicated to creating a stress-free, healthy, and joyful society through authentic Art of Living techniques.
about_text_2: Founded by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, the Art of Living organization operates in over 180 countries, touching millions of lives through meditation, breathwork, and service.
